p: Anaesthesiology finds itself again entwined with a global pandemic. The contagious and potentially devastating nature of the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) has violently disrupted anaesthesia practice. However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) public health crisis provides an opportunity to examine how anaesthesiology has contributed to confronting this and other pandemics, and, in turn, how pandemics have influenced our specialty.
